pages.title: Vault Pearls
pages.text: VH2.5 features various $(#033dfc)Vault Pearls$() that are Ender Pearl alternatives with specific attributes and durability. Every Vault Pearl is in a way better than a normal Ender Pearl, which all protect you from Fall Damage.
Crafting a $(#033dfc)Swift Vault Pearl$()$(br2)This Vault Pearl is $(#033dfc)rapidly thrown$() and can go much further distances and applies $(#033dfc)Speed 2+ on impact$() for 15s.
Crafting an $(#033dfc)Indestructable Vault Pearl$().$(br2)This Vault Pearl is an $(#033dfc)infinite Vault Pearl$(), however it is slightly slower than normal pearls.
Crafting a $(#033dfc)Unstable Vault Pearl$().$(br2)This Vault Pearl $(#033dfc)blows up on impact$(), not damaging the player or the environment, just dealing damage to other entities.
